h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Plaguebane Gourd Location
content: To get the Old Rattle Drum, you will have to enter the Windrest Hamlet in the Yellow Sand Formation area and the head to three specific locations around the area, following a boy's voice. Our Old Rattle-Drum questline guide has everything you need to know, and you can also find a brief breakdown of the quest below:

To get the Old Rattle Drum, you will have to enter the Windrest Hamlet in the Yellow Sand Formation area and the head to three specific locations around the area, following a boy's voice.
